heading: HR02309
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES AND THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO ALLEGED PRIORITIZATION OF PRIVATE LENDING INSTITUTIONS (PLIs) OVER THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM (GSIS), AND TO FURTHER INVESTIGATE THE PROCESS AND BASES OF ACCREDITATION INVOLVING PLIs
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-11-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02309
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES AND THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO ALLEGED PRIORITIZATION OF PRIVATE LENDING INSTITUTIONS (PLIs) OVER THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM (GSIS), AND TO FURTHER INVESTIGATE THE PROCESS AND BASES OF ACCREDITATION INVOLVING PLIs
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TEVES, ARNOLFO JR. A.
DATE FILED : 2018-11-20
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-11-26
